effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
